title: Generative AI, psychiatry and the risks of self-service therapy
subhead: Millions of people use chatbots like ChatGPT to share their distress, and the scientific community has warned about the risks vulnerable people face. Generative AI has shaken up psychiatric consultations, fueled tech giants' ambitions and emerged as a credible tool for analyzing pathologies.

title: US military to limit support for allies and prioritize homeland
Defiant protests over US immigration crackdown, child's detention
Macron should not target the European Central Bank
subhead: The French president has criticized the European Central Bank for keeping interest rates too high. While this criticism holds some truth for France, it does not apply to the rest of the eurozone, and overlooks the fact that France can only secure funding thanks to the strength of the central bank.

title: How researchers got AI to quote copyrighted books word for word
subhead: American researchers have found that artificial intelligence systems can memorize entire passages from texts that were, in theory, only intended to train them. This discovery could influence future court cases.

title: Two previously unknown scores by Johann Sebastian Bach identified after a 35-year investigation
subhead: Germany has celebrated this revelation, attributed to Peter Wollny, who conducted extensive research after discovering the pieces as a student of musicology.

title: A stenciled hand, the oldest known prehistoric cave painting, discovered in Indonesia
subhead: This 'negative hand,' which researchers have dated to at least 67,800 years ago, is now the oldest known example of cave painting. The discovery fills a crucial gap in tracing the path of our species' journey to Australia via Indonesia.

title: 'We were walking in blood': Iran's doctors recount crackdown on protesters

Fewer French tourists are traveling to the US
US strike on alleged drug-smuggling boat kills two in Pacific
Is it ever a good idea to... wear aviator sunglasses (when you're Emmanuel Macron)?
Confusion over closure of France's Bétharram Catholic school after abuse scandal
The RN's unspoken attraction to MAGA – and gradual ideological alignment
subhead: Like other European nationalists, Marine Le Pen has been put in a tough spot by Donald Trump's imperialist offensive. But the MAGA ideological campaign in Europe, of which France is a key target, has won over her Rassemblement National party over the past year.

title: France prepares for unpredictable municipal elections, one year before presidential vote
subhead: Local officials fear the national political crisis will have a ripple effect on the upcoming municipal elections in March. Three-way and four-way runoffs are expected to be widespread, paving the way for political realignments just months before the crucial 2027 presidential contest.

title: An era of distrust emerges between the US and its Western allies
subhead: Donald Trump's suggestion that the US could seize Greenland by force has exposed the strategic isolation his administration has chosen, in disregard for the country's commitments. Even though the Republican president abandoned the idea at Davos, the damage to US credibility is substantial.

title: France's low-emission zones fall victim to a shortsighted political class
Robert Malley, former American diplomat: 'Few truly care about the future of the Iranian people'
The necessary showdown with Donald Trump
